input.placeholder: Enter stock tickers (e.g., TSLA, VOO, QQQ)

modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this observation list?

messages.enterTickers: Please enter at least one stock ticker
messages.enterAtLeastOne: Please enter at least one stock ticker

alerts.disclaimerText: This is for educational purposes only. Not financial advice. Always do your own research.

tooltips.rsi: Relative Strength Index: Measures momentum. <30 = oversold (potential buy), >70 = overbought (potential sell)
tooltips.macd: Moving Average Convergence Divergence: Shows trend changes and momentum. Positive = bullish, negative = bearish
tooltips.bbPosition: Bollinger Bands Position: Shows where price is in the volatility range. <20% = near lower band (oversold), >80% = near upper band (overbought)
tooltips.volumeRatio: Current volume vs 20-day average. >1.2x = high activity (strong interest), <0.8x = low activity (weak conviction)
tooltips.support: Price levels where buying interest is strong enough to prevent further decline. Good entry points when price approaches support
tooltips.resistance: Price levels where selling pressure is strong enough to prevent further rise. May face difficulty breaking through these levels
tooltips.stockInput:
Supports global stocks from all major exchanges:
• US: TSLA, AAPL, GOOGL
• Hong Kong: 0700.HK, 9988.HK
• Japan: 7203.T, 6758.T
• UK: BP.L, HSBA.L
• Germany: VOW3.DE, DAI.DE
• Canada: SHOP.TO, TD.TO
Separate multiple tickers with commas
